com.splunk.logging.jdk.handler

Class SplunkRestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Handler
      • com.splunk.logging.jdk.handler.SplunkRestHandler

  • public class SplunkRestHandler
extends java.util.logging.Handler
    java.util.logging handler for sending events to Splunk via REST
    Author:
    Damien Dallimore damien@dtdsoftware.com
